Text:
There is a large amount of Spanish Not translated into English.  I found this Subtitle track: 
http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/subtitles/3558080/not-forgotten-en
Hopefully it is still available when you go to download it.  

To use the subtitles: unzip it and in VLC Player, under the video menu, Select "Subtitles Track - Open File..."
thanks miguel and mercury for the subs !
